data.eml:eml: New species and new records of Fannia Robineau-Desvoidy (Diptera, Fanniidae) from the Brazilian Amazon Region

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Wendt, Lisiane Dilli (2010): New species and new records of Fannia Robineau-Desvoidy (Diptera, Fanniidae) from the Brazilian Amazon Region. Zootaxa 2575: 38-48, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.197489
